Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui

Class WindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.WindowController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameController, LoginController, NotificationController
    public abstract class WindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the main window of the GUI, which should be extended by the specific implementations, such as the actual game window or the login screen
    Author:
    Carlo Dell'Acqua, Adriana Ferrari

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  WindowController.Dimension
      Enum of possible dimensions

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void autoResizeNodes​(double vw, double vh)
      Resizes the autoresizable nodes according to the new size of the main window
      void close()
      Closes the stage associated to this window
      protected void initializeViewport​(javafx.scene.layout.Region parent)
      Initializes the viewport and its children, which are added to the autoResizableNodes if they have adaptive properties
      void onResize()
      Updates the elements of the window when the viewport is resized
      private void readFlowPane​(javafx.scene.layout.FlowPane node, double vw, double vh)
      If a node is a FlowPane, it has more properties that can be set: vgap, hgap and wrap
      private void readGridPane​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane node, double vw, double vh)
      If a node is a GridPane, it has more properties that can be set: vgap and hgap
      private void readPadding​(javafx.scene.layout.Region node, double vw, double vh)
      Updates the padding of a node according to the dimension of the whole window
      protected void setupViewport​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane window)
      Sets the viewport used for properties represented in vw and vh
      private void setViewportSize​(double vw, double vh, double parentWidth, double parentHeight, WindowController.Dimension dimension, java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Double> setter, java.lang.String rawValue)
      Gives the consumer an updated value based on the viewport dimension
      void show()
      Shows the window in a non-blocking way
      void showAsModal()
      Shows the window in a blocking way

                           java.lang.String fxml,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> customStylesheets)
        Constructor which allows to set a title, a fxml source and multiple CSS stylesheets
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the window
        fxml - the path to the fxml file
        customStylesheets - a list of the CSS stylesheets to apply

        protected void setupViewport​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane window)
        Sets the viewport used for properties represented in vw and vh

      • setViewportSize

        private void setViewportSize​(double vw,
                             double vh,
                             double parentWidth,
                             double parentHeight,
                             WindowController.Dimension dimension,
                             java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Double> setter,
                             java.lang.String rawValue)
        Gives the consumer an updated value based on the viewport dimension
        Parameters:
        vw - the width of the viewport
        vh - the height of the viewport
        parentWidth - the width of the parent element
        parentHeight - the height of the parent element
        dimension - the dimension of the parent element to which the measurement is relative
        setter - the consumer of the updated double value
        rawValue - the string representing the actual measurement unit in vw, vh or %

      • autoResizeNodes

        protected void autoResizeNodes​(double vw,
                               double vh)
        Resizes the autoresizable nodes according to the new size of the main window
        Parameters:
        vw - viewport width
        vh - viewporth height

      • readFlowPane

        private void readFlowPane​(javafx.scene.layout.FlowPane node,
                          double vw,
                          double vh)
        If a node is a FlowPane, it has more properties that can be set: vgap, hgap and wrap
        Parameters:
        node - the FlowPane that shall be resized
        vw - viewport width
        vh - viewport height

      • readGridPane

                         double vh)
        Updates the padding of a node according to the dimension of the whole window
        Parameters:

        vw - viewport width
        vh - viewport height
